content: **this pattern is part of the summer 2024 collaboration between pom pom and hobbii** **size ** one size **finished measurements ** 40cm / 15¾ high x 46cm / 18 wide **materials ** hobbii judy 100% jute 50 g 1 75 oz = 70 - 75 m 76 - 82 yds shade nature 14 8 skeins **hook ** 6 00mm / us j crochet hook always use a hook size that will result in the correct gauge after blocking **gauge ** 11 sts & 5 row = 10cm / 4 over double_crochet with yarn held double using 6mm hook after blocking 1 granny square measures 11 5cm / 4¾ diameter after blocking **pattern information ** this bag is constructed by first crocheting eight granny squares and then joining with a whip stitch after all squares are joined you will pick up and crochet stitches along the top and bottom to create the top border and body of the bag after crocheting the body you will finish off with a whip stitch join **find the pattern in more languages here ** german 1 danish 2 swedish 3 norwegian 4 finnish 5 french 6 spanish 7 italian 8 polish 9 dutch 10 1 http //hobbii de/rose-window-jute-tote-bag
